inclusion.criterion: Participants with recurrent, progressive, or refractory brain tumors.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age ≥ 1 year and < 25 years at the time of screening.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants and/or guardian have the ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document according to institutional guidelines.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Evaluable disease, as defined as meeting any of the following:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants must have received their last dose of anticancer therapy (including experimental) at least 4 weeks prior to study enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants who are receiving corticosteroids must be on a stable or decreasing dose for at least 1 week prior to study enrollment with no plans for escalation.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participants must discontinue herbal preparations, herbal medication, and dietary supplements, with the exception of multivitamins, at least 7 days prior to study enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participants must have a Lansky (≤ 16 years) or Karnofsky (> 16 years) score of at least 50 and, in the opinion of the investigator, a minimum life expectancy of at least 6 weeks at the time of study enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant must have adequate bone marrow and organ function defined as:
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participants with a diagnosis of recurrent, progressive, or refractory low grade glioma (LGG).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous exposure to a CDK4/6 inhibitor (palbociclib, abemaciclib, or ribociclib).
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is receiving corticosteroids. However, the patient's last dose of anticancer therapy was received more than 4 weeks prior to study enrollment.
